{{cpp/container/span/title|empty}}
{{cpp/container/span/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool empty() const noexcept;
}}

Checks if the span is empty.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the span is empty (i.e., {{c|1=size() == 0}}); {{c|false}} otherwise.

===Example===
{{example|code=
#include &lt;iomanip&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;span&gt;
 
int main()
{
    std::span&lt;const char&gt; span{"ABCDEF"};
 
    while (!span.empty())
    {
        std::cout &lt;&lt; std::quoted(span.data()) &lt;&lt; '\n';
        span = span.last(span.size() - 1);
    }
}
|output=
"ABCDEF"
"BCDEF"
"CDEF"
"DEF"
"EF"
"F"
""
}}
